articles.title: Euclid opens data treasure trove, offers glimpse of deep fields - European Space Agency
articles.description: On 19 March 2025, the European Space Agency’s Euclid mission released its first batch of survey data, including a preview of its deep fields. Here, hundreds of thousands of galaxies in different shapes and sizes take centre stage and show a glimpse of their l…
